title: Cassiopeia recolouring suggestion
body:
Hey everyone,

With the sort-of recent update to Cassipeia's model, the colours bothered me quite a bit.
I've decided to recolor her in photoshop and see what you guys think, and maybe let Riot see it.
By recolouring her I mean making her resemble her splash art more.

I have recoloured her gold, green cloth, and scales. 
Would you like Riot to recolour Cassioepia to match her splash art?

replies.body: Woah. I actually like how the black looks on her. It actually makes her eye-catching.
I get to distracted by the horse face

> I get to distracted by the horse face

I know, it gets me hotter than Brand.
Is it not a known fact that Cassiopeia is the League's answer to Sarah Jessica Parker?
I agree your recolor looks better on current SR, but I wonder how it'll look on new SR.

Yeah, all texture updates have been happening so that champs fit in on the new Rift. She looks pretty striking there, and I think a darker recolor would be out of place.

http://imgur.com/Q9r5xLR

I think it'd be great if they gave Cass some texture changes (give her the snake eyes in her splash art, unless that's somehow not possible) and new icons when she gets those balance changes on the PBE, like what they did for Singed. Rito pls. {{champion:69}}

Doubt about the eys, since they are so small it's barely visible in full size. 
Minimized it's even smaller.
About the icons, she already recieved new ones when they updated her vfx for her abilities (about a year and a half ago). They are still quite recent IMO.

Oh, I didn't know that about the icons. I might have to disagree with you, though; Soraka had a similar situation with her old icons (got new icons on PBE pre-rework, and then got newer ones post-rework). They've changed her passive a lot, and are looking into changing her E quite a bit, so I could still see it happening. Riot tends to do things like that for "clarity".
Let's hope.
YES PLEASE
i think it's too dark. her darker hide/scales look seductive on her lower body, but i like the midtone approach they took :P

I disagree and everyone is entitled to their opinion, but you're wrong and I hate you.

Lol, now for real.

Yeah, it's your opinion, and it's a discussion.
Thanks for participating.

I'm actually a huge fan of Cass with her current coloring. The bright green is incredibly striking and noticable. There's also a trend in nature for poisonous animals to be very brightly colored, as a warning, so I think it fits.

Riot's also said before that the splash doesn't have to perfectly match the in-game model, and I think that's fine.
I like the way she looks at lot. If anything they should change the splash to match her in-game model. I just don't like the black tail. But that only my opinion! :3
I'd like it darker than it is now, but the black seems too dark, to me.
Her ventral scales are too narrow on the new model/textures, it's especially easy to see if you compare them to her splashart. That's one change that definitely needs to happen.
Her fingers aren't sharp. They're supposed to me like claw gloves or something but they look like normal golden gloves.

I think it looks that way due to "Charachter inking".

Can anyone check it in game without it to veify?
I'm ashamed to say I don't own Cassiopeia ;(
I prefer how she is now, although my opinion doesn't matter much since I use the gorgeous Siren Cass anyway.
can't see the difference :P need a side by side

Yeah sorry, 
Was working on it.
Should be up now.
These differences are too minor to give a hoot about.
